titleStmt.title: The mischief of impositions, or, An antidote against a late discourse, partly preached at Guild-hall Chappel, May 2, 1680, called The mischief of separation
titleStmt.author: Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Vincent Alsop. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library.
